page.title: 05MENSTRIE LODGE
page.content: The Menstrie{Old Folks' Home}was recently built in the heart of the village. It is a complex of family type units, each supervised by medical and social work staff. The residents live in individual rooms, but can meet with the other residents in communal areas. Menstrie Lodge, the name given to this complex, is perfectly situated, as there is easy access to transport. There are several shops and a Post Office nearby. Menstrie Lodge also caters for {day-care patients}who spend the day in the home and return to their own homes in the evening.
